Title: Insecure OpenID implementation
Description: Due to an insecure OpenID implementation used by user_openid in ownCloud 5 it is possible to log-into a system using an arbitrary OpenID Account (without knowing any secret information, i.e. the password, about it) by using a malicious OpenID provider.
ActionTaken: As the application is not longer maintained anymore, user_openid has been removed from the release.
Resolution: It is recommended that all instances are upgraded to ownCloud Server 5.0.15.
